bioconda.name: canu
bioconda.summary: Canu is a fork of the Celera Assembler designed for high-noise single-molecule sequencing.

biocontainers.name: canu
biocontainers.summary: De-novo assembly tool for long read chemistry like nanopore data and pacbio data.

biotools.summary: De-novo assembly tool for long read chemistry like Nanopore data and PacBio data.

bioschemas.name: CANU
bioschemas.summary: De-novo assembly tool for long read chemistry like Nanopore data and PacBio data.

galaxy.summary: Canu is a hierarchical assembly pipeline designed for high-noise single-molecule sequencing (such as the PacBio RS II/Sequel or Oxford Nanopore MinION).
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: De-novo assembly tool for long read chemistry like Nanopore data and PacBio data.
